title: Who Has Your Favorite Voice?
body:
Like the title says, which champions have your favorite Voice Overs?

Mine are:
Yasuo{{champion:157}} "Face the wind!"
Twitch{{champion:29}} "I was hiding!"
and Nasus{{champion:75}}(All his quotes sound really cool).

replies.body:
For me, it has to be Erin Fitzgerald who voices both {{champion:37}} , my favorite champion that I joined LoL just to play, as well as {{champion:40}} , who's new Fnatic skin will also be an insta-buy for me.  (Typical Miku fan)

By sheer coincidence, I realized much later on she also just so happens to voice Noire http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120911214035/hyperdimensionneptunia/images/e/e4/Neptunia_V_Noire.jpg, my favorite goddess in Neptunia.

My second favorite is Cristina Valenzuela who voices {{champion:92}}  and Compa.  Having said these, I love so many other champion voices it'd take too long to list them all.
She also voices Chie from Persona 4! She's so awesome.
Ah, you're right.  I keep forgetting because Chie originally had a different actress in the original P4.
Oh yeah, I only played Golden, but from what I've seen of the old one I like Erin a lot more.
Yeah Lux is one of my favorites too. <3

{{champion:24}} "Imagine if I had a real weapon!"
{{champion:15}} "You can't take it with you, so give it to me."
{{champion:157}} "Cute mask. Your, uh, mom sew that?"
{{champion:55}} "Violence solves everything!"

But {{champion:75}} does have like the best voice in the game.

Ewww. I mean actually ewwww. You like White Guy Samurai, Ratatatatatatatat and We Replaced The Best VO In The Game With This?

Don't touch me it might be contagious. 

I like Heimerdinger, Forecast Janna and Thresh.

I wasn't playing pre-Nasus Visual Update, maybe he was even more epic sounding. 

I think part of the reason I like Yasuo is his voice actor also was Akihiko in Persona 3, my favorite game.
